resources.string: It won\'t be an easy one!
• In the next page, first you have to click on each tile.
• There is a question waiting for you which you have to answer.
• Answer the question so that the tile would reveal what is hidden.
• Go on revealing each tile and complete the quest.
• There\'s something for you once you complete this quest.
Let\'s start with an easy question, what is the remainder you get after dividing 606 by 7?
What is the thing that you love to do irrespective of your mood to express yourself or sometimes just to feel delighted?
We are awesome friends, we both know that. But do you remember when was our friendship started?\n\n( Format: dd-mm-yyyy )
What is the word that you think comes to my mind when I hear somewhere?
Consider the roll number and registration number of both of us, what is common among them?\n\n( Take last two digits of the number )
What is the slang you use the most to call me instead of my name?
Tell me, when was the last time we saw each other physically?\n\n( Format: dd-mm-yyyy )
